title: Strawberry bran waffles
ingredients: ['125g (4 1/2 oz) wholemeal flour', '20g (3/4 oz) branflake cereal', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '225ml (8 fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '115g (4 oz) half-fat crème fraîche', '1 teaspoon clear honey, plus more to serve', '2 egg whites', '300g (10 1/2 oz) strawberries, sliced']
